entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 6:48 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023

Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 99 %

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023
